extends java.lang.Object

    The controller for the ArtworkForm.
    Author:
    Elisa Casadio

    • Constructor Detail

      • ControllerArtworkForm

        public ControllerArtworkForm(IArtGallery newModel,
                             IArtworkForm newView,
                             javax.swing.JFrame frame,
                             IArtworkView newViewArtwork,
                             int editValue,
                             boolean isShow)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        newModel - the model.
        newView - the view.
        frame - the main frame in which the view refers to.
        newViewArtwork - the artwork's view.
        editValue - the artwork's position if the artwork's informations are to be changed or -1 if it is a new artwork.
        isShow - true if the artwork's informations must be shown otherwise false.

    • Method Detail

      • commandConfirm

        public void commandConfirm(java.lang.Long code,
                           java.lang.String title,
                           java.lang.String author,
                           boolean isAC,
                           boolean isDC,
                           int year,
                           boolean isPaint,
                           java.lang.String artD,
                           java.lang.String techn,
                           double height,
                           double width,
                           double depth,
                           java.lang.String descr,
                           ArtworkForm form)
        Description copied from interface: IControllerArtworkForm
        Checks the accuracy of the form fields and saves the information of the artwork in the model and in the view. Show an error message if the fields are incorrect.
        Specified by:
        commandConfirm in interface IControllerArtworkForm
        Parameters:
        code - the code of the artwork.
        title - the title of the artwork.
        author - the author of the artwork.
        isAC - true if was selected "Avanti Cristo" otherwise false.
        isDC - true if was selected "Dopo Cristo" otherwiese false.
        year - the year of the artwork.
        isPaint - true if was selected "Pittura".
        artD - the type of artistic discipline of the artwork.
        techn - the painting technique or material of the artwork.
        height - the height of artwork.
        width - the width of artwork.
        depth - the depth of artwork.
        descr - the description of artwork.
        form - the current active form.
